name: Super Expert
description: Mario Maker's 'Super Expert Run' in Geometry Dash!

map-music.name: Map Music
map-music.description: Toggle on or off the super expert music whilst in the map

coin-lives.name: Coin Lives
coin-lives.description: Gives the player lives for any coins they may pick up in a run

level-info.name: Level Info
level-info.description: Opens the level page instead of sending straight into the level (useful for downloading songs)

skips.name: Skips
skips.description:
Sets the amount of skips allowed in a run.
<cr>SET THIS BEFORE A RUN</c>

lives.name: Lives
lives.description:
Sets the amount of lives per run.
<cr>SET THIS BEFORE A RUN</c>
